course_description: This course is taken concurrently with the second year of Contextual Education. This course is an integrative experience. Students reflect on their theological preparation at Candler and its pragmatic meaning for the future of the Baptist church family.
sections: Class Nbr: 5773, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Williams/Williams, Status: Open
